00037 
00039     class _OgreGLExport GLGpuProgram : public GpuProgram
00040     {
00041     public:
00042         GLGpuProgram(ResourceManager* creator, const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00043             const String& group, bool isManual = false, ManualResourceLoader* loader = 0);
00044         virtual ~GLGpuProgram();
00045 
00047         virtual void bindProgram(void) {}
00049         virtual void unbindProgram(void) {}
00050 
00052         virtual void bindProgramParameters(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params, uint16 mask) {}
00054         virtual void bindProgramPassIterationParameters(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params) {}
00055 
00056 
00058         GLuint getProgramID(void) const
00059         { return mProgramID; }
00060 
00066         virtual GLuint getAttributeIndex(VertexElementSemantic semantic, uint index);
00069         virtual bool isAttributeValid(VertexElementSemantic semantic, uint index);
00070 
00072         static GLuint getFixedAttributeIndex(VertexElementSemantic semantic, uint index);
00073 
00074     protected:
00076         void loadFromSource(void) {}
00078         void unloadImpl(void) {}
00079 
00080         GLuint mProgramID;
00081         GLenum mProgramType;
00082     };
